items.title: GreenfootKara
items.summary: GreenfootKara is a visual and interactive introduction to programming based on the Greenfoot IDE. An entire beginners course of 16-20 lessons.

items.title: GameGridKara
items.summary: GameGridKara is an introduction to programming with the mini-world Kara. All scenarios can be used in any IDE like Eclipse, Netbeans or BlueJ.

items.title: JavaFX 8 Tutorial
items.summary: Seven-part tutorial series for learning JavaFX from the ground up. Uses the new Java 8 and JavaFX 8 features.

items.title: JavaFX 2 Tutorial
items.summary: Seven-part tutorial series for learning JavaFX from the ground up.

items.title: Dart Drag and Drop
items.summary: Drag and Drop for Dart web apps with mouse and touch support.

items.title: Dart Event Bus
items.summary: An Event Bus library for Dart for decoupling applications.
